title: Expostulation
verses: O turn ye, O turn ye, for why will ye die,
Come now to the banquet and make no delay,
Since God in great mercy is com-ing so nigh; Since
For Christ bids you welcome, he bids you to-day; Come
Je-sus in-vites you, the Spir-it says, Come, And
wretched, come, starving, come just as you be, While
an-gels are wait-ing to welcome you home.
streams of sal-va-tion are flow-ing so free.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Urgent evangelical appeal typical of revival meetings
